HEADER.TITLE: ﻿Numeral-plus-classifier phrases, speaker F4. 'One' to 'thirty' plus the classifier for heads of cattle/objets that usually come in pairs.

NOTE.message: Technical note: there is some background noise due to strong wind during the recording session, hissing through the cracks in the roof. Also, I was typing the data as they were being elicited, hence the click sounds of keyboard keys.

S.TRANSL: une année
one year
一头（牲畜），只
deux+classificateur pour un membre d'une paire, et pour les têtes de bétail
two+classifier for heads of cattle, or members of a pair
两头（牲畜），只

NOTE.message: This phrase was elicited at this point to verify its tonal identity with 'twenty'+'classifier for heads of cattle, or members of a pair'.

S.TRANSL: vingt ans
